EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_TorontoOfficeOpening_Q314.Reminder to Attend
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Pivotal's Toronto Office Grand Opening on Oct. 2
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Reminder: Pivotal's Toronto Office Grand Opening Hi {{lead.First Name:default=}},
Pivotal's Toronto Office Grand Opening is almost here!
On Thursday, October 2, you'll be joining industry leaders from companies including BMO, Bell, Cineplex, RBC, Shaw Communications, Boston Pizza, Telus, TD, The Globe & Mail and many more. We'll also be showcasing some of our latest innovations in mobile.
The celebration kicks off at 6 p.m. at 1 Toronto St on the 11th floor where we'll be serving drinks, hors d'oeuvres and providing you with a great evening of entertainment and networking.
We look forward to seeing you on Thursday!
Sincerely, Farhan Thawar VP Engineering Canada, Pivotal Labs EVENT DETAILS PIVOTAL OFFICE 1 Toronto St 11th Floor Toronto, ON Thursday, October 2nd 6pm - 9pm FIND OUR OFFICE <http://goo.gl/cm9b0v>
